title: Visual Facilitation Drawing Workshop for Digital Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Utilizing Basic Digital Learning Tools and Domain Knowledge in Social Fields
context.additional_context: A course for office/administrative professionals to strengthen digital learning design capabilities through project-based assessments, utilizing collaboration tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners visually structure ideas using drawing during the digital learning design process
Learners facilitate design decision-making processes with peers by applying drawing techniques during collaboration
Learners explain the process of incorporating theoretical concepts into digital learning contexts through visual materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
